title: parama sukham tarum
sahitya:
parama sukham tarum japatapa sAdhanamE paNNiDu tiN manamE dinamE


anupallavi

  nirantaram varam tarum param tarum iham tarum


caraNam    citta shuddhi tarum jIvan mukti tarum tIvinai pOghum tiruvinaiyAgum
shuddha shakti shiva jyOti raghupriyA sundari sutantari shrIkari Om ena
